name: Closure (itch) (Passerine)
description:
Kira hasn't been the same since the breakup. Now she's done something really reckless, and she's asking for your help to figure out what went wrong with TJ. What else can you say? She's your best friend.

Texting adventure • Half an hour • Parser-based

I wrote Closure for the 27th Annual Interactive Fiction Competition in 2021, and this version is a lightly polished post-comp release.
